summary: Feature request to deprecate ListOpenWorkflowExecutions and ListClosedWorkflowExecutions methods due to their limitations and user confusion. Proposes keeping ListWorkflowExecutions, ListArchivedWorkflowExecutions, and ScanWorkflowExecutions as alternatives.
userImpact: Users are surprised and confused by the limitations of ListOpen/ListClosed methods when trying to apply combined filters.
proposedFix: Deprecate ListOpenWorkflowExecutions and ListClosedWorkflowExecutions, while keeping ListWorkflowExecutions, ListArchivedWorkflowExecutions, and ScanWorkflowExecutions as recommended alternatives.
keyQuote: Users get surprised by the limitations of ListOpen/ListClosed
